physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 4 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Dr. I. D. Bronfin, died July 31, 1934, Jewish Family and Children's Service President, #472.''

mods.abstract: Formal portrait of Dr. Isadore D. Bronfin. Bronfin was medical director at both JCRS and National Jewish and the president of Jewish Family and Children's Services of Denver.
mods.note: Donated by Jewish Family and Children's Services of Colorado.
